attributes.action: STOP FAKE HONNEY ENTERING SHOPS SHELVES
attributes.additional_details: Only the gov can enforce it
attributes.background: We want the government to be more active in food section  , especially the healthy foods like honney, there is more and more fake honney on shelves that is labelled as PURE HONNEY AND is not saying on labels that , it is contaminated or mixed with  sugar or other sweeteners

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Responsibility for assessing business compliance with the majority of food legislation rests with individual local authorities, not the Government or Parliament. Local authorities should consider any areas of non-compliance with food law and take appropriate enforcement action.
